Parameters.Name: Real Time Viewing DUT H.264 media2 streaming using HTTP transport.
Parameters.Description:
Use root/1 user name and password on Discovery tab
HTTPS port = 444
Media service must be: http://localhost:2780/MediaService.asmx

Test.Name: 2 profiles: 1st wo VideoSource and VideoEncoder; 2nd w/suitable GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions Response
2 profiles: 1st wo VideoEncoder; 2nd w/suitable GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions Response
2 profiles: 1st wo VideoSource; 2nd w/suitable GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions Response
4 profiles - 4th will be used in 2nd cycle
Test.Description: 1st profile w/ VSC and VEC - unsuitable options 2nd wo VSC 3rd w same VSC.token as 1st 4th wo VEC - will be used

Test.Name: no GovLengthRange in profile; is in GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions
no ProfilesSupported in profile; is in GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions
GovLengthRange in profile; is in GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions
ProfilesSupported in profile; is in GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions

no ProfilesSupported in Configuration; is in GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions
